name: Calculate Hours for Detail Drawings
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA Detail Drawings:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((0.05*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Standard Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Specialty Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Monitor Module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of 4-20mA monitor module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Control module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Isolation modules)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of pull stations)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of horns)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of strobes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of combination units)*>))+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((0.05*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Standard Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Specialty Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Monitor Module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of 4-20mA monitor module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Control module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Isolation modules)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of pull stations)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of horns)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of strobes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of combination units)*>))+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*0.25))*0.5) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval((((0.05*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Standard Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Specialty Detectors)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Monitor Module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of 4-20mA monitor module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Control module points)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of Isolation modules)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of pull stations)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of horns)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of strobes)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of combination units)*>))+(<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*0.25))*0.5)*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
